mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(user_id) as loginCount,create_time FROM `log_login` WHERE create_time > (SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 6 DAY)) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY create_time ASC

SELECT count( log.user_id ) AS loginCount, ro.NAME AS roleName, log.create_time AS createTime FROM log_login log, sys_user_role ur, sys_role ro WHERE log.create_time LIKE #{currentDate} AND log.user_id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = ro.id GROUP BY ro.NAME
